content.question: The point of view that Hitler expresses in the first three paragraphs is most directly significant in helping to explain how which of the following contributed to starting the Second World War?

choices.label: Nationalist movements in European colonies opposing imperialism
Ideological rivalry between fascist and communist states
The use of mass media such as radio to spread propaganda
The provisions of the Treaty of Versailles that ended the First World War

content.answer: The provisions of the Treaty of Versailles that ended the First World War

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain the significance of a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience, including how these might limit the use(s) of a source.
